mapper.update: UPDATE feeds SET content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE feed_id = #{feedId}
mapper.select: SELECT f.* FROM feeds f JOIN follow_user fu ON f.user_id = fu.followed_id LEFT JOIN feed_read fr ON f.feed_id = fr.feed_id AND fr.user_id = #{userId} WHERE fu.follower_id = #{userId} AND fr.id IS NULL ORDER BY f.created_at DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT f.* FROM feeds f LEFT JOIN feed_likes fl ON f.feed_id = fl.feed_id LEFT JOIN feed_bookmarks fb ON f.feed_id = fb.feed_id LEFT JOIN comments c ON f.feed_id = c.feed_id WHERE f.created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR) GROUP BY f.feed_id ORDER BY (COUNT(DISTINCT fl.id) * 1.5 + COUNT(DISTINCT fb.id) * 2 + COUNT(DISTINCT c.id)) DESC LIMIT 50
